control: Program AE, Aperture Priority AE, Shutter Priority AE, Manual Exposure
edit: * Mode (Dial) : 1) Auto 2) Program 3) A/S/M 4) Smart 5) Best Face 6) Magic Plus 7) Settings 8) Wi-Fi * Auto : Portrait, Night Portrait, Night, Backlight Portrait, Backlight, Landscape, White, Macro, Macro Text, Tripod, Action, Macro Color, Natural Green, Blue Sky, Sunset, Fireworks, lowlight, spotlight, spotlight macro, spotlight portrait * Smart : , Beauty Face, Landscape, Action Freeze, Panorama, Waterfall, Silhouette, Sunset, Fireworks, Light Trace, Low Light Shot, Rich tone, Contiuous Shot, Macro * Magic Plus : Effect Artist, Color Brush, My Magic Frame, Motion Photo, Photo Filter, Movie Filter, Photo Editor * Wi-Fi : MobileLink, Remote Viewfinder, SNS & Cloud, E-mail, Auto Backup, AllShare Play, S/W Upgrade Notifier, AutoShare * Drive : Single, Continuous(High, Low), BKT(AE) * Self timer: Off, 2 sec., 10 sec.

powersource: Rechargeable battery : SLB-10A Connector Type : micro USB (5 pin) 155 mins / 310 shots
digitalzoom: Still Image mode : 1.0X ~ 5.0X Play mode : 1.0X ~ 9.4X (depends on image size) * Intelli-zoom : 2.0X
speaker: Mono Internal Speaker : Mono
externalmemoryoptional: MicroSD (up to 2GB guaranteed), MicroSDHC (up to 32GB guaranteed), MicroSDXC (up to 64GB guaranteed) - Class 6 and above recommended
fileformat: * Still Image : JPEG (DCF), EXIF 2.21 * Movie Clip : MP4 (Video: MPEG4, AVC/H.264, Audio: AAC)
meteringsystem: Metering : Multi, Spot, Center-weighted, Face Detection AE Metering Range : EV 1~17 (Wide, ISO Auto), EV 3~17 (Tele, ISO Auto)
modes: Auto WB, Daylight, Cloudy, Fluorescent_H, Fluorescent_L, Tungsten, Custom, K
wifi: Wi-Fi Connectivity - MobileLink, Remote Viewfinder, SNS & Cloud, E-mail, Auto Backup, Samsung Link - S/W Upgrade Notifier, AutoShare * Samsung Link : Nearby Device, Web Storage * SNS & Cloud - Global(0) : Facebook, YouTube, Picasa, Dropbox - China(2) : Weibo, RenRen, Poco, Dropbox - Hongkong(4) : Facebook, YouTube, Picasa, Weibo, RenRen, Poco, Dropbox - Korea(1) : Facebook, YouTube, Picasa, KAKAOSTORY, Dropbox - United States(8) : Facebook, YouTube, Picasa, EVERNOTE, Dropbox - Russia(5) : Facebook, YouTube, Picasa, VK, Odnoklassniki, Dropbox - France(9) : Facebook, YouTube, Picasa, Orange, Dropbox - United Kingdom(7) : Facebook, YouTube, Picasa, Knowhow, Dropbox * S/W Upgrade Notifier : Supported in setup menu not Wi-Fi mode, and only for notification * RVF : Added function of home monitoring by connection to AP, streaming without saving * facebook, weibo, email : Supporting to add comment
recording: * Smart Movie : Landscape, Blue Sky, Natural Green, Sunset * Movie Size : 1920x1080(30fp), 1280x720 (30fp), 640x480 (30fps), 240 web * 21x optical zoom (Max. recording time : 20min) * Voice : Sound Alive, Sound Alive Off * Dual Capture (Movie 1080p@30pfs & Still 2M pixels)
windows: PC with processor better than Intel Core 2 Duo 1.66 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 Dual-Core 2.2 GHz or higher Minimum 512MB RAM (Over 1GB recommended) Windows XP SP2 / Vista / 7/8 250MB of available hard-disk space (Over 1GB recommend) USB 2.0 port nVIDIA Geforce 7600GT or later / Ati X1600 series or later 1024x768 pixels, 16-bit color display compatible monitor (1280x1024, 32-bit color display recommended) Microsoft DirectX 9.0c or later
options: Single image, Thumbnails, Advanced Slide Show, Movie Clip, Smart Album
